content: I think I'll check out the LR Baggs Venue DI and the Pedaltrain Nano Acoustic pedalboard. I've heard great things about LR Baggs and their products are specifically designed for acoustic guitars. The Pedaltrain Nano Acoustic pedalboard looks like a great option too, it's compact and has a built-in DI box which would simplify my setup. Do you have any other recommendations for acoustic guitar accessories that could help improve my tone and playing experience?
